content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of multiple building blocks arranged into two main connected structures:

1. Left Structure:
   - Has a house-like design with a red archway topped with an orange triangular roof
   - Green cube blocks on the sides
   - Orange cylindrical blocks
   - Orange triangular blocks

2. Right Structure:
   - A red rectangular tunnel/doorway design with holes on both sides
   - Green cube in the middle
   - Blue cube on one side

Total block count: 13 blocks
Layers: The structure has 1-3 layers depending on the section

## Spatial Relationships
- The left structure has green rectangular blocks (#8) standing vertically on both sides
- Two orange cylindrical blocks (#10) stand vertically in front of and behind the red archway
- A red arch block (#1) sits on top of these elements
- An orange triangular block (#14) sits on top of the red arch as a roof
- Orange triangular wedges (#11, #15) are positioned at the base of the structure

- The right structure has a red arch block (#1) at the top
- Another red arch block (#3) at the bottom
- A green cube (#5) in the middle right side
- A blue cube (#4) on the left side

# Block Selection from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks from the dictionary are required:

1. Red arch block (index #1) - used twice (top and one side of right structure)
2. Red curved block (index #2) - not visible in the main structure
3. Red vertical arch block (index #3) - used once (bottom of right structure)
4. Blue cube (index #4) - used once (left side of right structure)
5. Green cube (index #5) - used three times (sides of left structure and middle of right structure)
6. Yellow cube (index #6) - not used
7. Green horizontal rectangular block (index #7) - not used
8. Green vertical rectangular block (index #8) - used twice (sides of left structure)
9. Green horizontal rectangular block (index #9) - not used
10. Orange cylinder (index #10) - used twice (vertical columns in left structure)
11. Orange triangular wedge (index #11) - used once (right side of left structure)
12. Orange cube (index #12) - not used
13. Orange triangular wedge (index #13) - not used
14. Orange triangular wedge (index #14) - used once (roof of left structure)
15. Orange triangular wedge (index #15) - used once (left side of left structure)
16. Orange triangular wedge (index #16) - not used

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 5 (Green cube for bottom left side of structure)
    Step2: Move block with index 8 (Green vertical rectangle for left side)
    Step3: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylinder for left front)
    Step4: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylinder for left back)
    Step5: Move block with index 8 (Green vertical rectangle for right side)
    Step6: Move block with index 15 (Orange triangular wedge for left side)
    Step7: Move block with index 11 (Orange triangular wedge for right side)
    Step8: Move block with index 1 (Red arch block for top of left structure)
    Step9: Move block with index 14 (Orange triangular wedge for roof)
    Step10: Move block with index 3 (Red vertical arch for bottom of right structure)
    Step11: Move block with index 5 (Green cube for middle of right structure)
    Step12: Move block with index 4 (Blue cube for left side of right structure)
    Step13: Move block with index 1 (Red arch block for top of right structure)
}
```
